org.afree.data
Interface KeyedValues2D

All Superinterfaces:
Values2D
All Known Subinterfaces:
BoxAndWhiskerCategoryDataset, CategoryDataset, IntervalCategoryDataset, StatisticalCategoryDataset
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultCategoryDataset, DefaultKeyedValues2D
public interface KeyedValues2D
extends Values2D

An extension of the Values2D interface where a unique key is associated with the row and column indices.

Method Summary

          Returns the column index for a given key.

getColumnCount, getRowCount, getValue

Returns the row key for a given index.

getValue

java.lang.Number getValue(java.lang.Comparable rowKey,
                          java.lang.Comparable columnKey)
Returns the value associated with the specified keys.

Parameters:
rowKey - the row key (null not permitted).
columnKey - the column key (null not permitted).
Returns:
The value.
Throws:
UnknownKeyException - if either key is not recognised.
